const ethers = require("ethers");
const bank = await (await ethers.getContractFactory("Bank")).attach("0x5FbDB2315678afecb367f032d93F642f64180aa3")
const {ethers} = require("ethers");
const bank = await (await ethers.getContractFactory("Bank")).attach("0x5FbDB2315678afecb367f032d93F642f64180aa3")
const {ethers} = require("ethers");
const bank = await (await ethers.getContractFactory("Bank")).attach("0x5FbDB2315678afecb367f032d93F642f64180aa3")
